legibleDescription.textElement: The WAGO testsystem provides analog and digital outputs and inputs that allows automated and manual testing of SmartGridready communication-handler implementations for modbus.
Das WAGO Testsystem stellt analoge und digitale Ausgänge und Eingänge zur Verfügung die es ermöglichen einen SmartGridready Communication-Handler für Modbus zu testen.
The WAGO testsystem provides analog and digital outputs and inputs that allows automated and manual testing of SmartGridready communication-handler implementations for modbus.

configurationDescription.textElement: Message broker hostname or IP address.
configurationDescription.label: Broker Hostname

configurationDescription.textElement: Device identifier used in MQTT topic.
configurationDescription.label: Device ID
